motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivationalQuotes.author: Winston Churchill

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivationalQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

motivationalQuotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivationalQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
motivationalQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

motivationalQuotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
motivationalQuotes.author: Confucius

motivationalQuotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
motivationalQuotes.author: William James

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
motivationalQuotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
motivationalQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
motivationalQuotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

motivationalQuotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
motivationalQuotes.author: Thomas Edison

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivationalQuotes.author: Sam Levenson

motivationalQuotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
motivationalQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
motivationalQuotes.author: Walt Disney

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

motivationalQuotes.quote: Donâ€™t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
motivationalQuotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

motivationalQuotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
motivationalQuotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
motivationalQuotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivationalQuotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
motivationalQuotes.author: C.S. Lewis
